blogPost.excerpt: Essentially, Squat-O-Meter is a mobile app that promises a whole lot of fun by taking users to the ex-Soviet streets and teaching them how to Slav squat. The app uses pose estimation technology good enough to detect and estimate the user’s positions/movements while squatting.
blogPost.body: Essentially, Squat-O-Meter is a mobile app that promises a whole lot of fun by taking users to the ex-Soviet streets and teaching them how to Slav squat. The app uses pose estimation technology good enough to detect and estimate the user’s positions/movements while squatting.
blogPost.title: Squat-O-Meter - Squat like a gopnik in the ex-USSR streets.
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 本质上，Squat-O-Meter是一款手机应用，它承诺将用户带到前苏联的街道上，教他们如何进行斯拉夫人蹲，从而带来很多乐趣。这款应用使用的姿势估计技术足以检测和估计用户下蹲时的位置/动作。
localize.tagline: 像戈普尼克一样蹲在前苏联的街道上。

localize.description: 本質上，Squat-O-Meter是一款手機應用，它承諾將用戶帶到前蘇聯的街道上，教他們如何進行斯拉夫人蹲，從而帶來很多樂趣。這款應用使用的姿勢估計技術足以檢測和估計用戶下蹲時的位置/動作。
localize.tagline: 像戈普尼克一樣蹲在前蘇聯的街道上。

previous.excerpt: Tiny stocks watcher for the menu bar. Add your favorite tickers to always see the current price. Powered by Yahoo Finance API. Buy on the Mac App Store for $0.99 or free install via Xcode. For any further information or features, feel free to contact me.
previous.title: Market Bar - Tiny stocks watcher

localize.description: 微小的股票观察者的菜单栏。添加您喜欢的股票，随时查看当前价格。由雅虎财经API提供支持。在 Mac App Store 上购买，售价 0.99 美元，或通过 Xcode 免费安装。如有任何进一步的信息或功能，请随时联系我。
微小的股票觀察者的菜單欄。添加您喜歡的股票，隨時查看當前價格。由雅虎財經API提供支持。在 Mac App Store 上購買，售價 0.99 美元，或通過 Xcode 免費安裝。如有任何進一步的信息或功能，請隨時聯繫我。
